016
017package org.parboiled.matchers;
018
019import static imagingbook.parboiled.common.Preconditions.*;
020import org.parboiled.MatcherContext;
021import org.parboiled.Rule;
022import org.parboiled.common.ImmutableList;
023import org.parboiled.common.Utils;
024import org.parboiled.trees.ImmutableGraphNode;
025
026/**
027 * Abstract base class of most regular {@link Matcher}s.
028 */
029public abstract class AbstractMatcher extends ImmutableGraphNode<Matcher> implements Matcher, Cloneable {
030    private String label;
031    private boolean nodeSuppressed;
032    private boolean subnodesSuppressed;
033    private boolean nodeSkipped;
034    private Object tag;
035
036    public AbstractMatcher(String label) {
037        this(new Rule[0], label);
038    }
039
040    public AbstractMatcher(Rule subRule, String label) {
041        this(new Rule[] {checkArgNotNull(subRule, "subRule")}, label);
042    }
043
044    public AbstractMatcher(Rule[] subRules, String label) {
045        super(ImmutableList.<Matcher>of(toMatchers(checkArgNotNull(subRules, "subRules"))));
046        this.label = label;
047    }
048
049    private static Matcher[] toMatchers(Rule[] subRules) {
050        Matcher[] matchers = new Matcher[subRules.length];
051        for (int i = 0; i < subRules.length; i++) {
052            matchers[i] = (Matcher) subRules[i];
053        }
054        return matchers;
055    }
056
057    public boolean isNodeSuppressed() {
058        return nodeSuppressed;
059    }
060
061    public boolean areSubnodesSuppressed() {
062        return subnodesSuppressed;
063    }
064
065    public boolean isNodeSkipped() {
066        return nodeSkipped;
067    }
068
069    public boolean areMismatchesMemoed() {
070        return false;
071    }
072
073    public String getLabel() {
074        return label;
075    }
076
077    public boolean hasCustomLabel() {
078        // this is the default implementation for single character matchers
079        // complex matchers override with a custom implementation
080        return true;
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public String toString() {
085        return getLabel();
086    }
087
088    public AbstractMatcher label(String label) {
089        if (Utils.equal(label, this.label)) return this;
090        AbstractMatcher clone = createClone();
091        clone.label = label;
092        return clone;
093    }
094
095    public Rule suppressNode() {
096        if (nodeSuppressed) return this;
097        AbstractMatcher clone = createClone();
098        clone.nodeSuppressed = true;
099        return clone;
100    }
101
102    public Rule suppressSubnodes() {
103        if (subnodesSuppressed) return this;
104        AbstractMatcher clone = createClone();
105        clone.subnodesSuppressed = true;
106        return clone;
107    }
108
109    public Rule skipNode() {
110        if (nodeSkipped) return this;
111        AbstractMatcher clone = createClone();
112        clone.nodeSkipped = true;
113        return clone;
114    }
115
116    public Rule memoMismatches() {
117        return new MemoMismatchesMatcher(this);
118    }
119
120    public Object getTag() {
121        return tag;
122    }
123    public void setTag(Object tagObject) {
124        tag = tagObject;
125    }
126
127    // default implementation is to simply delegate to the context
128    public MatcherContext getSubContext(MatcherContext context) {
129        return context.getSubContext(this);
130    }
131
132    // creates a shallow copy
133    private AbstractMatcher createClone() {
134        try {
135            return (AbstractMatcher) clone();
136        } catch (CloneNotSupportedException e) {
137            throw new IllegalStateException();
138        }
139    }
140
141}
142
